DEJ' EVUES, are cellular memory of our loved ones, or guides memory's while=
 
 on earth when they lived, this universe is far to vast a place for souls=
 
to  return here over and over again, makes no sense really. 16 people cou=
ld 
have  been related to Cleopatra through cell memory, but they all canno=
t have 
been  her.  When ones hears about the "long, long line" going from =
darkness 
into  the light for all those who may have thought they were goin=
g to 
reincarnate, to  buy Heaven know differently now.  There is a such th=
ing as 
"incarnation"  but that is far different from reincarnation.  Diffe=
rence is: with 
R, they  try to buy the way into Heaven, with In, they are =
already coming 
from Heaven  down to help on this side for a purpose, not t=
o try to earn 
brownie points to  get into Heaven, they come here to attach=
 with other spirits 
in the body to aid  in some way, or for a Divine purpo=
se. sf
 
 
In a message dated 10/17/2010 12:58:16 P.M. Eastern Standard Tim=

I believe in the reincarnation =

ever u spell it..lol..done al=
ot of traveling and seem to know whats coming  
down the road before we get=
 there.....That recorder your husband uses,is it 
 digital....

carnation is real, he was met with

or  the other, but we do recognize th=
at this is excellent proof of 
intelligent  communication... how often do y=
ou scan the dial and get like five or 
six  "no"'s this close together?
